title: Facebook Winds Down Its Newsletter Service
description: The Bulletin platform, which featured writers like Malcolm Gladwell and Mitch Albom, will be closed early next year, the company said.

title: Elon Musk Suggests Buying Twitter at His Original Price
description: The billionaire’s surprise move came months after he tried to back out of a $44 billion deal to acquire the company.

title: Amazon Freezes Corporate Hiring in Its Retail Business
description: It is the latest tech company to pump the brakes on hiring amid growing economic concerns.

title: Elon Musk Suggests Buying Twitter at His Original Price
description: The billionaire’s surprise move came less than two weeks before a trial that could force him to buy the company, after trying to back out of an earlier deal.

title: Amazon Freezes Corporate Hiring in Its Retail Business
description: It is the latest tech company to pump the brakes on hiring amid growing economic concerns.

title: ‘Hard Fork’: A New Technology Podcast from The New York Times
description: A weekly look at the future that’s already here. Listen to the trailer of our new tech podcast.

title: Twitter Board Chair Squares Up to Elon Musk Ahead of Trial
description: Bret Taylor, an understated executive, led talks with Elon Musk over his plans to acquire the company. Now, he’s leading the legal fight to seal the deal.

title: Micron Pledges Up to $100 Billion for Semiconductor Factory in New York
description: The company is planning a giant complex in Clay, N.Y., a sign that the government’s investments in semiconductors are steering firms’ decisions.

title: South Korean Internet Giant Buys Poshmark in $1.2 Billion Deal
description: With its new acquisition — the company’s largest to date — Naver has gained a sizable foothold in North America’s secondhand retail market.

title: N.L.R.B. Rules Activision Withheld Raises Because of Union Activity
description: The embattled video game company is in union negotiations with workers at its subsidiary Raven Software.
